T﻿his is a delicious restaurant tucked away in a strip mall treasure trove in Nepean.

I﻿t doesn't take long to realize there's something special afoot in this lovely place. You have to try the chicken.

![smiling people](https://www.narcity.com/media-library/this-filipino-restaurant-in-ottawa-serves-drool-worthy-feasts-for-you-all-your-friends.png?id=28269968&width=1245&height=700&coordinates=6%2C0%2C0%2C0 "People smile as they serve food")
